original_text: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:
korean_text: 예수께서 그들 앞에 또 비유를 들어 이르시되 천국은 좋은 씨를 제 밭에 뿌린 사람과 같으니

sentences.original_text: Another parable put he forth unto them
The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man
which sowed good seed in his field
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 밭에 좋은 씨를 뿌렸음이라
